text: Somnirel Clinical Dossier: Patient Case Studies. 1. Overview. Real-world longitudinal outcomes. 2. Case Study A: The Executive Insomniac. Acute Stress patient. Table 1: 4-Week Progress.

sections.heading: 2. Case Study A
sections.content: 45-year-old male executive reduced sleep latency from 75 to 18 minutes over 4 weeks.

text: 3. Case Study B: The Shift Worker. Circadian Disruption in ER Nurse. Table 2: Sleep Quality Scoring. 4. Longitudinal Safety Data. 0% dependency reported.

sections.heading: 3. Case Study B
sections.content: ER Nurse improved sleep efficiency from 62% to 88% using Melatonin-SR component.
